title: How to Create a Firefox Profile

steps.title: Open the Start Menu and click "Run" (or use the Vista search box).
steps.content: Open the Start Menu and click "Run" (or use the Vista search box).

steps.title: Click on "Create Profile..."
steps.content: Click on "Create Profile..." and click "Next". Enter a name for your profile.

steps.title: Click on "Finish" to create your new profile.
steps.content: Click on "Finish" to create your new profile.

steps.title: Click on "Start Firefox" and the "Import Settings" and "Data Wizard" will appear.
steps.content: Click on "Start Firefox" and the "Import Settings" and "Data Wizard" will appear.

steps.title: Rename a profile by selecting it and click on "Rename Profile".
steps.content: Rename a profile by selecting it and click on "Rename Profile".

steps.title: Delete a profile by clicking on "Delete Profile".
steps.content: Delete a profile by clicking on "Delete Profile". You will be asked if you want to delete the files in your profile folder. Select "Don't Delete Files" if you want to retain these files.
